devStack: Web developer, cross-platform, data science, machine learning, and deep learning.
devResume: My favorite stack is Flutter, Python, PostgreSQL, and Docker. I have experience with Jboss, Tomcat, Openshift, Oracle, Genexus, Java, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Firebase, Jupyter, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, and more.

aboutDescription.paragraph: I have worked with more than 26 multidisciplinary teams creating innovative solutions in the world of credit, debit, and prepaid card payments for {CABAL PARAGUAY}. I love optimizing processes and designing scalable architectures that handle large volumes of transactions without losing efficiency. I am part of the team behind the financial application {DIMO} that handles thousands of daily transactions and the integration of more than 15 cooperatives into the transactional ecosystem of {SICOOP}.

I am an adaptable and results-oriented person, always looking for practical solutions to complex problems. I always seek to simplify integration work with other systems or APIs, and I enjoy translating technical jargon into clear ideas so that any team, technical or not, can understand and work in harmony.
I am always looking for new challenges that help me grow professionally. I am motivated by continuous learning, facing technological challenges, and leading with empathy and commitment.

Besides technology, I am passionate about working on robotics projects and anything with a geek touch. I am a proud nerd and Star Wars fan, and when I'm not coding, I enjoy spending time with my wife and daughter, exploring new places, and creating memories together.

experienceList.description: CRM for transfer tracking and customer service.

Manager, control, and handling of connections between Banks and Cooperatives.
Transactional reconciler for controlling transactions within the SICOOP transactional ecosystem.
Calculation and distribution among Banking actors.
Upgrade to Cabal's invoicing system to issue electronic documents.

experienceList.description: Integration of various cooperatives. Collaborated with companies like Konecta, Kove, Kernel, Gtov, dPago, and more. Also part of the team that implemented services with Banks like Atlas, Fic, Interfisa, and Continental.
